title: Almost There
detail_text: <:th_ch0206/>Uooooh, Kanata is at full power!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>You're really pumped up, huh, Kanata?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>You say that, but you didn't oversleep either today, right, Karin-chan?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>Hey everyone.... The joint event is getting close, don't you feel nervous?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Hmm~, Kanata is probably more excited than nervous.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>I feel like I'm raring to go.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Mine is more like, "I can't wait to meet our fans."<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>You guys are really amazing, aren't you....? Compared to me, I....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Geez~, Mia-chan! If you feel nervous, just tell us! We are experts in dealing with nervousness, after all~. Karin-chan, Emma-chan, ready....?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>Hm? What's going on? Why are you guys slowly getting closer to me? This is scary, you know!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>This is what we do to nervous girls!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>We hug them!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
